name: Finneas
text: There's a safe here. Looks like it's unlocked...

name: Finneas
text: There's a document inside... 'Patient Transfer: Penelope O'Dessa to Basement Wubg, Room B01. Special condition: Do not disturb after 8PM.'

name: Finneas
text: Pen... that's my sister! She's in the basement... !

name: Finneas
text: (I need to get to the basement to find Pen...)

name: Finneas
text: Probably best not to mess with hospital property.
